import { Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { NgbModal } from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; import { Inventario } from './inventario'; import { InventarioService } from './inventario.service'; declare var windows: any; @Component({ selector: 'app-inventario', templateUrl: './inventario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inventario.component.css'] }) export class InventarioComponent implements OnInit { inventarios: Inventario[] = [] constructor(private inverntarioService: InventarioService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getInventerio() } getInventerio(): void { this.inverntarioService.getInventerio() .subscribe((response: any) => { this.inventarios.push(response); console.log(this.inventarios) }); } }
